Package mthree.vendingmachine.service

Interface VendingMachineService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VendingMachineServiceImpl
    public interface VendingMachineService
    Author:
    utkua

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCredit​(int[] addedCoins)
      Adds passed amount to user credit total.
      Item buyOne​(String name)
      Attempts to process purchase of an item by user.
      List<Item> getAllItems()
      Retrieves all Item objects with stock remaining in Item HashMap.
      BigDecimal[] getChange()
      Gets user change as coins.
      int getCount()
      Gets count of Items with stock remaining.
      BigDecimal getCredit()
      Gets credit user currently has in machine.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllItems

        List<Item> getAllItems()
                throws VendingMachinePersistenceException
        Retrieves all Item objects with stock remaining in Item HashMap.
        Returns:
        List of all Item objects.
        Throws:
        VendingMachinePersistenceException

      • getCount

        int getCount()
      throws VendingMachinePersistenceException
        Gets count of Items with stock remaining.
        Returns:
        count of Items.
        Throws:
        VendingMachinePersistenceException

      • addCredit

        void addCredit​(int[] addedCoins)
        Adds passed amount to user credit total.
        Parameters:
        addedCoins - array of coins with values corresponding to number of each coin added.

      • getCredit

        BigDecimal getCredit()
        Gets credit user currently has in machine.
        Returns:
        remaining credit as BigDecimal.

      • buyOne

        Item buyOne​(String name)
     throws VendingMachinePersistenceException,
            NoItemInventoryException,
            InsufficientFundsException
        Attempts to process purchase of an item by user. If successful, reduces stock of chosen item and reduces user credit.
        Parameters:
        name - name of Item user wishes to buy.
        Returns:
        Item bought.
        Throws:
        VendingMachinePersistenceException
        NoItemInventoryException
        InsufficientFundsException

      • getChange

        BigDecimal[] getChange()
        Gets user change as coins.
        Returns:
        change returns to user as array with number of each coin returned, where each array index corresponds to a coin.
